text: Pas ej mu'minon cun ʙo kofiron ru ʙa ru suded dar majdoni cang, gardanasonro ʙizaned. Ba hamcunin idoma dihed, to ʙa andozae dusmanro ʙa kustan jo zaxmi kardan, za'if namoed va cun onhoro saxt furu kufted, asirason kuned va saxt ʙiʙanded. On goh onohro ʙa ehson ozod kuned jo ʙa fidja (ʙa ivazi pulu mol). To on goh, ki cang ʙa pojon ojad. Va in ast hukmi Alloh. Va agar Alloh mexost (na ʙa rohi cang, ʙalki az rohhoi digare, misli tufon, zaminlarza, sel, ƣarq soxtan va digar ofatho) az on kofiron intiqom megirift, vale xost, to sumoro ʙa jakdigar ʙijozmojad. Va onon, ki dar rohi Alloh kusta sudaand, hargiz savoʙi a'molasonro ʙotil namekunad
